mapper.sql: id, box_id, arrival_time, courier_id, user_id, code
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `order` ( id, box_id, courier_id, code,create_time) VALUES ( #{order.id}, #{order.boxId}, #{order.courierId}, #{order.code},#{order.createTime} )
mapper.select: select o.id as id, c.name as boxId, o.create_time as createTime, o.code as code from `order` as o inner join box as b on b.id=o.box_id inner join cabinet as c on b.cabinet_id=c.id where courier_id=#{id} and arrival_time is null order by o.create_time desc;

select r.id as id, r.name as name, count(*) as data from region as r inner join cabinet as c on c.region_id=r.id and r.is_directory='0' and r.del_flag='0' inner join box as b on c.id=b.cabinet_id inner join `order` as o on b.id=o.box_id where o.create_time>=#{start} and o.create_time <= #{end} group by r.id
